section.name: ToolLoader Reference Documentation
section.p: A view tool that allows template designers to load view tools from within the template. Any object with a public constructor without parameters can be loaded into the context. This tool is considered by the developers to be merely a development tool and inappropriate for use in a production setting.

method.name: load()
method.abstract: Loads an instance of a tool and returns it.

parameters.parameter: The name of the class to instantiate.

description.p: Loads MathTool with name $math into the context. Then, its random() function is used to generate a random number between 1 and 1000.
